Hamilton Customized Shirtmaker of Houston

Described by Guy's Style as "one of the most rigorous shirtmakers worldwide," Hamilton is a respected customizing business based out of Houston, Texas. The bulk of their company is on-line or mail order.

When you send your measurements or have them taken by a Hamilton associated store, the firm will certainly make you a custom-made shirt pattern that you could use time and again for future orders.

After the initial expense of making your personal pattern, the rate of their tee shirts goes down to an average of in between $170 and also $300, depending upon the material as well as the style of the shirt. They also liquidate the rack.
